      Updating a hold was placed on an available book
      Parameters:
      bookCopyId - the book copy with a hold placed on it
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected after updating the book's availability to unavailable

    • holdOnUnavailableBook

      public int holdOnUnavailableBook(Long bookId, Long userId, int nextPosition)
      Updating a hold was placed on an unavailable book
      Parameters:
      bookId - the book with a hold placed on it by adding an user to its wait list
      userId - the user that is placing a hold on a book and added to its wait list
      nextPosition - the next position in the wait list where the user is inserted
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected after inserting a new user into a book's wait list

    • waitListUserUpdate

      public int waitListUserUpdate(Long bookId)
      Updating a book's wait list by moving all the users up one position
      Parameters:
      bookId - the book that has its wait list updated
      Returns:
      the number of updates to move the positions up one for all users in a book's wait list

    • removeNextUserWaitlist

      public int removeNextUserWaitlist(Long bookId)
      Removing the next user in a book's wait list because book is available to be borrowed immediately
      Parameters:
      bookId - the book's wait list that is updated by removing the first user in a book's wait list
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by deleting the user from a book's wait list

      Parameters:
      user - the user who placed a hold on a book
      book - the book that has a hold on it
      Returns:
